description: Details required for Condition 10 (Public Realm Improvements) and 29 (Energy and Sustainability) of planning permission 20/01024/FUL (Retention, refurbishment and associated external alterations to existing retail unit with proposed part two, part three storey extension of existing building to provide 33 x residential self-contained flats with provision of cycle parking, public area improvements and associated works)
decision_conditions: The submitted details in relation to Condition 10 (Public Realm Improvements) are considered to be inadequate and not sufficiently detailed to ensure satisfactory appearance of the public realm. Furthermore, the proposal is considered not to be in-keeping with the local area and its character and therefore not  preserving the significance of Kingston Old Town Conservation Area, the Market Place or the Riverside, the areas that it is directly linked to. As such the provided information in relation to Condition 10 is contrary to  Policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy (2012) and comply with Supplementary Planning Document 'Access for All' (July 2005).
